thread.section_title: Gettington.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gettington.com | www.gettington.com
thread.title: Robert Titterington

author: Robert Titterington
title: Robert Titterington
text:
I planned on making a purchase with my Gettington plan and even thou the funds were there I was denied, my purchase. I have never been late on a payment since I've had this account. And when I need to purchase in the future I will shop some where else. Thank You for all the past purchases I have made. But I know you could care less about losing one customer, But It cares to me.
Sincerely,
Robert Titterington
